description: India-Pakistan tensions: Amritsar district admin issues safety advisory, asks people to stay indoors - The Amritsar district administration has issued a safety advisory urging residents to stay indoors, keep lights off, and avoid windows amid a heightened security alert. The advisory also asks residents to avoid stepping onto roads, balconies, or terraces and to remain calm.

The Adolescence Effect: How teen boys are getting sucked into the manosphere - A psychologist at Delhi's Juvenile Justice Board II reveals alarming insights into the digital world's impact on teenagers, from hacking and bomb threats to toxic masculinity, online radicalization, and the dangers of the manosphere and looksmaxxing culture.

Ram Madhav writes: It’s time India framed a national security doctrine - The question is not whether we were able to thwart attacks effectively, but whether we can ensure that there won’t be any attacks at all

India-Pakistan conflict LIVE: G7 countries condemn Pahalgam terror attack, urge immediate de-escalation - India-Pakistan conflict LIVE: PM Modi held a high-level meeting with External Affairs Minister S. Jaishankar and National Security Advisor Ajit Doval on Friday, following fresh attacks on Friday night. The G7 countries have issued a statement urging de-escalation amid rising tensions.

Remain fully alert to deal with any crisis: FM Nirmala Sitharaman to banks amid India-Pakistan tensions - India-Pakistan tensions: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman asked banks to remain fully alert to deal with any crisis and said that the Government of India is firmly committed to national security and economic stability.

Operation Sindoor: Kolkata Port Enhances Security Amid National Alert - Syama Prasad Mookerjee Port boosts security, cancels staff leave, and enhances cybersecurity. India bans Pakistan-flagged vessels at ports amid national tension.

Tripura Reviews Indo-Bangladesh Border Security Amid Tension With Pakistan - Tripura CM Manik Saha held a security review meeting to enhance vigilance along the India-Bangladesh border, focusing on countering cross-border threats.

As India-Pak Tensions Rise, Centre Asks States To Activate Emergency Powers: What Does It Mean? - Union Ministry of Home Affairs directs states to invoke emergency powers under Civil Defence Rules, 1968, for quick response to heightened security threats.

Cyber Alert: Govt Tells RBI, NPCI To Amp Up Security As Tensions Escalate - Govt asks RBI, banks, NPCI to boost cyber security amid India-Pak conflict to protect digital payments and financial systems.
Cheerleader Recalls Fearful Moments As IPL Match In Dharamshala Abandoned Amid Bomb Threats - Cheerleader recalls panic as IPL match in Dharamshala abandoned.

India's S-400 Missile System Blocks Pakistan's Aerial Attack In J&K, Punjab, Rajasthan - The system can intercept targets moving at speeds of up to 4.8 kilometres per second, offering high precision in neutralising fast-moving threats

How S-400 Missile System, India's Sudarshan Chakra, Thwarted Pakistan's Attack On 15 Cities - Indian Air Force's S-400 systems, nicknamed 'Sudarshan Chakra', intercepted aerial threats from Pakistan on May 7-8, showcasing precision and speed.

Mock drill in India on 7 May LIVE: Security beefed up in Delhi, sirens tested in Pune, states prepare for ‘new threats’ - Mock drill in India on 7 May LIVE: Amid tensions with Pakistan, MHA has decided to organise Civil Defence Exercise and Rehearsal across 244 categorised districts on May 7. Stay tuned for latest updates on the mock drill.

Mock drills planned in nearly 300 'civil defence districts' with sensitive installations - In response to emerging security threats following the recent Pahalgam terror attack, the MHA has ordered mock drills in nearly 300 ‘civil defence districts' across India. These districts contain sensitive installations such as nuclear plants, refineries, and military bases.

NSG Commandos Reevaluate Security at Shri Jagannath Temple Amid Heightened Safeguards - A four-member NSG team visited Puri's Shri Jagannath Temple for a routine security review. The inspection focused on various security protocols at the high-traffic pilgrimage site. The visit aligns with standard NSG procedures, ensuring preparedness against potential threats.

Gangsters’ call, GPS device under SUV: Z-cover for Delhi BJP chief Virendra Sachdeva - Police discovered a portable GPS device attached to the SUV of Delhi BJP chief Virendra Sachdeva during an anti-sabotage check prompted by threats from wanted gangster Nandu. Sachdeva, who is now under ‘Z’ category security, was allegedly contacted by Nandu’s associates. Nandu is notorious for extorting money and is wanted in multiple cases.

Harvard Under Fire: Federal Funding Freeze Amid Education Policy Clash - Harvard University is facing threats from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security over alleged violations involving foreign students and campus protests. The Trump administration has halted millions in funding and warned of further repercussions. The situation raises concerns about academic freedom under current educational policies.

Salman Khan on death threats: Jitni Umar Likhi Hai, Utni Likhi Hai - The actor speaks candidly about the impact of heightened security on his daily life amid ongoing threats from the Lawrence Bishnoi gang

Salman Khan Reacts To Lawrence Bishnoi's Death Threats Ahead Of Sikandar Release: 'Jitne Umar Likhi Hai...' - Gunshots were also fired outside Salman Khan's Mumbai apartment last year, following which, the actor's security was stepped up.

Salman Khan breaks silence on death threats from Lawrence Bishnoi: ‘Jitni umar likhi hai, utni likhi hai’ - Addressing the media ahead of the release of Sikandar, Salman Khan addressed the tight security he has deployed after getting death threats from Lawrence Bishnoi.
DDCA Alerted After Chilling Email Threatens Stadium Blast Linked To India-Pakistan Cross-Border Strife - Stadium blast threat linked to Indo-Pak tension alarms DDCA.

Bomb Squads Deployed, Security Tightened In Arun Jaitley Stadium After Blast Threat - Bomb squads were deployed, and security tightened at Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi after an anonymous bomb threat.

Bhagwant Mann: ‘Operation Sindoor a clear message that India will not tolerate terrorism, threat to sovereignty’ - “Punjab is the land of shaheedan (martyrs), faujiyan (soldiers), and kisaans (farmers). So long as we are in-charge, no one will dare destabilise it,” says CM

Bomb Threat Mail For KKR vs CSK IPL Match; CAB Alert Kolkata Police ‘For More Security’ At Eden Gardens - Kolkata Knight Riders vs Chennai Super Kings IPL 2025 match saw tight security due to a bomb threat. No incidents reported.

Operation Sindoor: Orange alert issued, military hospitals in Pune step up vigilance - An Orange alert indicates a high likelihood of a significant security threat or disaster and triggers heightened security protocols. Pune is home to three top military hospitals.
